mapper.sql: id, flash_promotion_id, flash_promotion_session_id, spu_id, promotion_price, original_price, flash_promotion_num, flash_promotion_limit, sort_id
mapper.select: SELECT r.id as id, r.flash_price as flashPrice, r.flash_promotion_num as flashPromotionNum, r.flash_promotion_limit as flashPromotionLimit, r.flash_promotion_id as flashPromotionId, r.flash_promotion_session_id as flashPromotionSessionId, r.sku_id as sku_id, r.original_price as originalPrice, r.sort_id as sortId, p.spu_id as spuId, p.sku_no as skuNo, p.stock as stock FROM flash_promotion_spu r LEFT JOIN sku p ON r.sku_id = p.id WHERE r.flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionId} AND r.flash_promotion_session_id = #{flashPromotionSessionId} ORDER BY r.sort_id DESC
